channel.title: WiFi Pokemon Diamond/Perl friend code exchange
channel.description:
do not post if you are just saying pokemon is stupid, that is your opinion, but there are many others with an opinion against that as well. First you need to [u]have[/u] the game(s), you must have interconnection locally to get a friend code, or else you could not see this message, and you must have a wireless access point or a Nintendo WiFi adapter USB.
Post in this format
Game: (Diamond/Perl) __________________ 0000-0000-0000 __________________
Here is mine:
Game: Perl __________________ 1117-6753-0092 __________________

item.title: WiFi Pokemon Diamond/Perl friend code exchange
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

I’m getting this in a week, however, go here: http://www.neogaf.com/forum/showthread.php?t=118162 and to the last page for plentiful friend codes
If they ask for your GAF name just say “Drinky Crow”

Read full topic
item.source: WiFi Pokemon Diamond/Perl friend code exchange
